pages.title: Spotted Hyena
pages.text: It is listed as being of least concern by the IUCN on account of its widespread range and large numbers estimated between 27,000 and 47,000 individuals.$(br2)The species is, however, experiencing declines outside of protected areas due to habitat loss and poaching.

pages.title: Spotted Hyena
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)3 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rotten_flesh$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: 4 Days
